name: wl-luk-imim1i
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1))
-| wi(w2, w0)
-| wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1))
-| wi(w2, w0)
-| wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)))

comment: Inference adding common consequents in an implication, thereby interchanging the original antecedent and consequent. Copy of ~ imim1i with a different proof. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2018.)
